data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
In the minute 2, Kashiwa drives forward and Michael Olunga gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tosu are caught offside.
In the minute 4, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kashiwa are coming forward and Ataru Esaka gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Tosu have a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Yuta Higuchi (Tosu) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
Riki Harakawa of Tosu smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 11, Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Kashiwa pushes forward through Michael Olunga, whose finish on goal is saved.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 14, Kashiwa takes a corner from the left.
Jiro Kamata of Kashiwa gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Kashiwa.
Ball goes out of play for a Tosu goal kick.
Goal! The away team take a 0-1 lead through Michael Olunga.
In the minute 25, Shunki Takahashi instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Free kick Tosu.
In the minute 30, Kashiwa's Hiroto Goya misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Tosu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
In the minute 32, Kashiwa are pushing forward but Hiroto Goya's finish is wide of the goal.
Throw-in for Kashiwa at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Kashiwa takes a corner from the right.
In the minute 37, Tosu's Daichi Hayashi misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Tosu are whistled for offside.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Tosu are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Tosu in their own half.
Tosu have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Tosu.
The first-half is over.
Daichi Hayashi levels the score at 1-1 from the penalty spot.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Tosu make their first substitution with Ryoya Morishita replacing Shinya Nakano.
Kengo Kitazume is replacing Shunki Takahashi for the away team.
In the minute 47, Kashiwa are coming forward and Michael Olunga gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Tosu have a goal kick.
Riki Harakawa puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 48, Yuto Uchida with an assist there.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Tosu.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Kashiwa needs to be cautious. Tosu have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Kashiwa.
Throw-in high up the field for Kashiwa in Tosu.
In the minute 55, Goal kick for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
Ball safe as Tosu is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashiwa in their own half.
In the minute 57, Can Tosu capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashiwa's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
In the minute 59, Throw-in Tosu.
Masatoshi Mihara (Kashiwa) gets a yellow card.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kaisei Ishii.
Kaisei Ishii is back on his feet again.
In the minute 62, Kashiwa have a dangerous throw-in.
The away team replace Masatoshi Mihara with Hayato Nakama.
Corner awarded to Tosu.
In the minute 65, Tosu to take a throw-in in Kashiwa territory.
Free kick for Kashiwa in their own half.
Richardson is on a sub for Hidekazu Otani for Kashiwa.
In the minute 66, Kaisei Ishii, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Takeshi Kanamori is the substitute for Tosu.
Tosu make their third substitution with Ryang Yong-Gi replacing Yuto Uchida.
Tosu awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 73, Tosu are in shooting range from this free kick.
Tosu are pushing forward but Daiki Matsuoka's finish is wide of the goal.
Kashiwa have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Fumiya Unoki is on a sub for Hiroto Goya for Kashiwa.
Throw-in for Tosu at Ekimae Real Estate Stadium.
The home team replace Daichi Hayashi with Yohei Toyoda.
In the minute 79, Throw-in for Kashiwa in the half of Tosu.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Fuchi Honda is replacing Tomoya Koyamatsu for the home team.
In the minute 80, Kashiwa takes a corner from the left.
Kashiwa are coming forward and Sachiro Toshima gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Tosu.
In the minute 81, Kashiwa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Kashiwa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tosu's half?
Free kick for Tosu in the half of Kashiwa.
In the minute 82, Hayato Nakama is booked for the away team.
Free kick for Kashiwa in the half of Tosu.
Ryang Yong-Gi (Tosu) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 85, Throw-in for Kashiwa close to the penalty box.
Michael Olunga (Kashiwa) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Free kick Tosu.
In the minute 88, Richardson (Kashiwa) has received a first yellow card.
Tosu awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Kashiwa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 6 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
In Tosu a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in Kashiwa.
Throw-in high up the field for Tosu in Tosu.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashiwa goal kick.
Free kick Kashiwa.
Free kick for Tosu in their own half.
Kashiwa awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-1.
